messages.message:
Enable payments through micropayment erwerben. You need to configure each desired module at the provider's website (Service: Event).
Important: You should not use this provider if you do not operate your project on an Apache web server.
Payments can be only registered when the above configured buy-in options are valid for amounts in EUR (Euros). Other currencies are currently not supported by the provider.
Required settings for payment services:
API Url: http://www.mydomain.com/websoccer/webservices/micropayment/index.php
GET Parameters:
amount=__amount__
free=__$freeparam__
You will get that ID once you configure a new project at www.micropayment.de.
Will be shown on micropayment.de when you log on and go to "Project and Payment management".
